subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: In the hours before Tiger Woods teed off with a three-stroke lead in the final round of the 89th P.G.A. Championship, even Yogi Berra might have thought it was over.
snippet: In the hours before Tiger Woods teed off with a three-stroke lead in the final round of the 89th P.G.A. Championship, even Yogi Berra might have thought it was over.
